Apple___Apple_scab.cause: Fungus Venturia inaequalis. Favorable conditions are cool, wet weather.
Apple___Apple_scab.cure: Use fungicides and resistant apple varieties. Prune and destroy infected leaves.

Apple___Black_rot.cause: Caused by the fungus Botryosphaeria obtusa.
Apple___Black_rot.cure: Prune and remove infected areas. Apply fungicides during the growing season.

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.cause: Fungus Gymnosporangium juniperi-virginianae. Requires junipers as an alternate host.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.cure: Remove nearby juniper hosts. Use resistant varieties and fungicides.

Apple___healthy.cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

Blueberry___healthy.cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

Cherry___Powdery_mildew.cure: Apply sulfur-based or fungicide treatments. Ensure good air circulation.

Cherry___healthy.cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

Corn___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray_leaf_sp.cure: Use resistant hybrids and fungicide sprays.

Corn___Common_rust.cure: Apply fungicides and plant resistant varieties.

Corn___healthy.cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

Grape___Black_rot.cure: Prune infected areas and apply fungicides.

Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).cure: Remove infected wood. Avoid injuries to vines.

Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.cure: Apply fungicides and manage vineyard hygiene.

Grape___healthy.cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).cause: Bacterium Candidatus Liberibacter spp. Spread by psyllid insects.
Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).cure: Control psyllid population and remove infected trees.

Peach___Bacterial_spot.cure: Use resistant varieties and copper-based bactericides.

Peach___healthy.cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

Pepper,_bell___healthy.cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

Potato___Early_blight.cure: Apply fungicides and practice crop rotation.

Soybean___healthy.cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

Squash___Powdery_mildew.cure: Apply sulfur-based fungicides and maintain good air circulation.

Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.cure: Remove infected leaves and apply fungicides.

Strawberry___healthy.cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.cure: Apply copper-based bactericides and practice crop rotation.

Tomato___Early_blight.cure: Apply fungicides and remove infected leaves.

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.cure: Apply fungicides and ensure good ventilation.

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.cure: Remove infected leaves and apply fungicides.

Tomato___Target_Spot.cure: Apply fungicides and ensure good air circulation.

Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.cure: Control whitefly population and use resistant varieties.

Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.cause: Virus transmitted through contact and contaminated tools.
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.cure: Remove infected plants and sterilize tools.

Tomato___healthy.cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.
